---
title: Valvular Heart Disease
---

Affects one or more of the 4 heart valves

Over time can lead to pumping dysfunction and heart failure

Types of Diseases

- Stenosis (narrowing)
- Regurgitation - back flow of blood thru valve, occurs w/ incomplete closure
- Prolapse- enlarged valve cusps, cusps can become floppy, bulge backwards, can progress to regurg
